content.rendered:
Last August, Handshake launched a new way to create meaningful connections between students and employers in a virtual setting.

Over the course of the semester we made many enhancements, upgrades, and refinements to the product—and we learned a lot from our higher ed partners on the best ways to market, staff, and support a fair.

Watch this webinar for:

  • A demonstration of Handshake’s virtual fair feature
  • Best practices for supporting and staffing your spring fairs from our in-house and partner experts
  • A look at our roadmap for virtual fair feature updates in the spring

Followup Resources:

  • Virtual Fair Launch Kit: Resources to help you plan your virtual Fair. Includes all of the links we shared during the webinar.
  • Virtual Fair Release Notes: Shares updates on major virtual fair features that have launched or are coming soon.
  • Fall 2020 Updates Recap: Review of major virtual fair updates launched last fall.

More questions on virtual fairs? Attend our Weekly Office Hours, visit our Help Center, or reach out to your Relationship Manager.

View all career center webinars

excerpt.rendered: Kickoff the semester with an overview of the latest updates and best practices for Handshake virtual fairs.
